data.comment: The big names in today's match at Gelredome have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Arnhem.
In the minute 31, Oussama Tannane (Vitesse) has received a first yellow card.
Oussama Darfalou is on target to give Vitesse a 1-0 advantage.
Lois Openda with an assist there.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Oussama Darfalou (Vitesse) has received a yellow card from Paulus van Boekel.
In the minute 61, Luis Sinisterra is on a sub for Leroy Fer for Feyenoord.
Bart Nieuwkoop (Feyenoord) gets a yellow card.
Daan Huisman is replacing Lois Openda for the home team.
In the minute 71, Feyenoord make their second substitution with Luciano Narsingh replacing Bart Nieuwkoop.
At Gelredome, Jacob Rasmussen has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The home team replace Matus Bero with Idrissa Toure.
In the minute 86, Idrissa Toure for Vitesse has been booked by Paulus van Boekel and receives a first yellow card.
Naoufal Bannis is on a sub for Bryan Linssen for Feyenoord.
Thomas Buitink is replacing Oussama Darfalou for Vitesse at Gelredome.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
